characters.name: Pilot Officer Jack Absolute
characters.description: Section Leader, Blue Section ‘A’ Flight, 634 Hurricane Squadron (“The Flying Badgers”). Son to Sir Anthony Absolute, in love with Lydia Languish. Confident, comic book hero.

characters.name: First Officer Lydia Languish
characters.description: Aircraft delivery pilot, Air Transport Auxiliary (ATA). Heiress to most of Sussex. Niece and ward of Mrs Malaprop.

characters.name: Mrs Malaprop
characters.description: Lady of Fontwell Manor. Sometime guardian to Miss Lydia Languish. A lady of great lexicographical dexterity and faultless electrocution. Talks to the audience with a twinkle in her eye.

characters.name: Pilot Officer Roy Faulkland
characters.description: Hurricane pilot, ‘A’ Flight, 634 Squadron. Fiancé and cousin to Julia Melville, best friend to Jack Absolute. Innocent and soppy!

characters.name: Julia Melville
characters.description: Chief Volunteer, Auxiliary Territorial Service (ATS). Driver to Sir Anthony. Fiancée and cousin to Roy Faulkland. Best friend to Lydia Languish. A jolly good sort.

characters.name: Lucy
characters.description: Lady’s maid to Mrs Malaprop, Smitten with Dudley. A cockney.

characters.name: Major General Sir Anthony Absolute
characters.description: Lord of most of Devon. Scourge of India. Father to Jack Absolute. Absolute silver fox. No-nonsense army man.

characters.name: Pilot Officer Bob Acres
characters.description: Hurricane pilot, ‘A’ flight, 634 squadron, Australian. A bit slow off the mark.

characters.name: Pilot Officer Bikram ‘Tony’ Khattri
characters.description: Hurricane pilot, ‘A’ flight, 634 squadron, Sikh from the Punjab. South Asian / Indian actor required. An educated Oxford graduate who likes to think he’s a poet.

characters.name: Warrant Officer 2 Dudley Scunthorpe
characters.description: Lead mechanic/fitter to Blue Section, 634 squadron, RAF Fontwell. A Yorkshireman. Smitten with Lucy.

characters.name: Flight Officer Peter Kingsmith
characters.description: Very small role at end of play, also part of ensemble, Hurricane pilot.

characters.name: Flight Sergeant Stuart Sampson
characters.description: Very small role at end of play, also part of ensemble.
Possible extras for the potential ensemble in one small section of the play.

We might create a little musical theme throughout where live musicians or singers would be featured at moments throughout. Think Andrews Sisters or a 40s Skiff band. Doesn’t have to be the same group for all 10 shows….
